name: Nature's Veil
trigger: when you invoke spirits of nature to hide yourself
effects: you gain the Invisible condition until the end of your next turn
limits: you can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once)
you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/phb2024/05-Character Classes (Continued) - PlayeraTMs Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf
